email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 75,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Maria Santos
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225m. The laycan is 15-20 November. The starting freight quote is USD 25/MT.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate of USD 25/MT is a bit high. We are seeing rates closer to USD 22/MT in the market. Can you revise the quote?

Best regards,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Maria,

I understand your concern. After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 23/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day pro rata.

Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
John,

Thank you for the revised quote. USD 23/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan dates and let's proceed with the fixing.

Best regards,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Maria,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laycan dates are confirmed for 15-20 November. We will proceed with the fixing and send you the charter party shortly.

Best regards,
John Doe
